fact-4.value: The principal activity of the Company is that of a holding company for the Group, as well as performing all administrative, corporate finance, strategic and governance functions of the Group

fact-5.value: The Company was incorporated on May 14, 2014 as Auctus Growth Limited, in England and Wales under the Companies Act 2006 with company number 09040064, with an investment strategy to undertake an acquisition of a target company or business. The Company was re-registered as a public company on July 24, 2014. On December 4, 2020, the Company’s name was changed to HeiQ plc.
